item

Interface Activatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForceFieldGenerator, LightGrenade

    public interface Activatable
    User: jonas Date: 03/05/13 Time: 13:40

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Drops the item.
      void drop()
      Activates the item.
      boolean isActive()
      Returns whether the item is active or inactive.
      boolean isDropped()
      Returns whether the item was dropped on the square by a player

    • Method Detail

      • isDropped

        boolean isDropped()
        Returns whether the item was dropped on the square by a player
        Returns:
        true if and only if the item is dropped

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Returns whether the item is active or inactive.
        Returns:
        True if and only if when the item is active

      • drop

        void drop()
          throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Activates the item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - thrown if the current state isn't inactive. An item can only go to an active state from an inactive one.

      • activate

        void activate()
              throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Drops the item.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the item is active or worn out it cannot be dropped.
